title: Captain's Choice: A Romance
description: Passion never sizzled so hot in this love triangle, Damian McCaffrey, the roguish sexy pilot, is being driven crazy with his desire for Captain Jillian Ames. Something about her uptight ways turns him on and she secretly desires him, too, though she'd rather die than admit it. Tension between them escalates when a routine supply run becomes a rescue mission. And when a handsome Antarean male declares Jillian to be his soul mate, Jillian comes face to face with every woman's secret fantasy: two men in love with her at the same time. This erotic romance will keep you at the edge of your seat wanting to know who she will choose.
author: Sierra Darcey
